about:
Ninjurr

FYI: Not very active anymore. I only play every now and then and very casually, so I don't play as well as I used to. If you need to contact me you can do so in game, or you could click on my Youtube link and PM me on there. <3

Why have I been inactive?

The answer to this is I have been very bored of Minecraft lately. I guess I just played way too much of it, and it got to a very repetitive point. I started to play other games, such as RuneScape. Also, my friend got falsely banned(he isn't even aloud to get texture packs, how would he be aloud to get hacks), so I haven't had anyone to play with, and playing solo for me isn't as fun as with friends. #FreeHoboChaos2015.
